name: Voice Crack Simulator
description:
Give a presentation about your favourite topic whilst avoiding an embarrassing

 scene in front of your classmates by timing your dialogue correctly.
If you fail, you'll end up voice cracking!

Gain a score streak and rack up points to beat your highest score!

  • Animal Crossing style dialogue
  • Embarrassing voice cracks
  • Small easter eggs
  • Weird presentations!

Spacebar - Hit the zone at the correct time
Esc - Pause the game
Right click - Zoom the camera in

A class full of kids, bored out of their minds, waiting for the lesson to end or
begging for it not be their turn to present. Yet, eager to see how you'll fail the presentation. 

 This class has a ton of memes and small details to keep an eye out for. 

Music : Chillpeach - Purple: https://youtu.be/BWNx0VQJjMY

SPECIAL THANKS
James & Minde!
